title: Entry-Level Software Engineer
description: We're seeking an entry-level software engineer to join our dynamic team. This is a fantastic opportunity for someone just starting their career who already has decades of industry experience.
qualifications: Minimum 50 years of experience in software development
15+ years of experience with React (released in 2013)
PhD in Computer Science from Mars University
Must have invented at least 3 programming languages
Fluent in 47 human languages and all machine languages
Own transportation worth minimum $150,000
Must be willing to work 24/7/365 including holidays
References from Steve Jobs, Bill Gates, and Alan Turing required
responsibilities: Single-handedly rewrite our entire codebase in 48 hours
Be available for meetings at 3 AM, 3 PM, and 3 in the afternoon
Mentor senior developers despite being entry-level
Provide your own computer, desk, office building, and parking lot
Train AI models to replace yourself (unpaid)
Debug production issues while sleeping
Time travel to fix legacy code written before you were born
benefits: Health insurance* (*covers one aspirin per decade)
Free coffee** (**you supply beans, we provide tap water)
Exposure and experience (our currency of choice)
Pizza party once every leap year
Flexible schedule*** (***flexibility to work any 23 hours per day)

title: Unpaid Marketing Intern
description: Exciting unpaid internship opportunity for experienced marketing professionals looking to gain entry-level experience!
qualifications: MBA from Harvard, Yale, and Oxford simultaneously
20+ years of TikTok marketing experience (TikTok launched in 2016)

Previous experience as CMO at Fortune 500 company

responsibilities: Manage entire marketing department solo
Generate $10 million in revenue per quarter
Create viral campaigns hourly
Respond to emails within 30 seconds at all hours
Teach executives what social media is
Make our CEO TikTok famous
Bring your own clients and projects
benefits: Exposure (we can't pay rent with it, but neither can you)
Coffee machine access* (*BYO coffee, sugar, and cups)

description: Communicate with social media algorithms. Decode their mysterious ways. Sacrifice your mental health to the engagement gods.
qualifications: 45+ years experience with algorithms (algorithms invented 1960s)
PhD in Algorithm Psychology
Must have personal relationship with Mark Zuckerberg's AI
Ability to predict algorithm changes before they happen
Previous experience as Algorithm Priest at Meta
Own neural link to social media platforms
Expert at reverse engineering black box systems
Can speak binary fluently
responsibilities: Decode constantly changing algorithms
Predict algorithm updates with 100% accuracy
Teach clients to manipulate engagement
Post at exact optimal times (never sleep)
Work 24/7 monitoring algorithm behavior
Have mental breakdown when algorithm changes
Sell soul to engagement metrics

title: Corporate Buzzword Generator
description: Create new meaningless business terms. Invent buzzwords that sound important but mean nothing. Synergize paradigms proactively.
qualifications: Master's degree in Saying Nothing Eloquently
40+ years experience creating corporate jargon
Must have invented at least 50 meaningless business terms
Ability to combine random words into impressive-sounding phrases
Previous experience as consultant charging $10,000 for obvious advice
Expert at making simple concepts needlessly complex
Own thesaurus collection worth $2,000+
Can write 5,000-word document with zero substance
responsibilities: Invent new buzzwords daily
Create frameworks for things that don't need frameworks
Write thought leadership pieces with no thoughts
Develop methodologies for common sense
Speak at conferences about nothing specific
Work 50+ hours per week generating nonsense
Convince executives your jargon means something
benefits: Holistic approach to not understanding your job

title: Hustle Culture Influencer
description: Promote unhealthy work habits as aspirational lifestyle. Make people feel bad for sleeping. Glorify burnout.
qualifications: Previous nervous breakdown from overwork
30+ years experience working 100-hour weeks
Must already be burned out (we'll make it worse)
Ability to post about hustle while being miserable
Previous experience as LinkedIn thought leader
Own collection of hustle culture motivational posters
Expert at toxic positivity and crushing guilt
Can shame people for having work-life balance
responsibilities: Post about waking up at 4 AM daily
Shame people for taking breaks
Promote grinding as identity
Create content glorifying overwork
Work yourself to exhaustion modeling hustle
Ignore your declining mental and physical health
Convince followers they're not working hard enough

title: Virtual Event Disaster Coordinator
description: Organize virtual events nobody wants to attend. Create networking opportunities that feel forced and awkward.
qualifications: 35+ years experience planning events (virtual events invented 2020)
Must have attended 10,000+ Zoom calls
Expert at making virtual events somehow worse than in-person
Previous experience creating social awkwardness digitally
Ability to ignore that nobody wants this
Own premium Zoom subscription worth $300/year
Comfortable forcing camera-on policies
Can facilitate icebreakers that nobody enjoys
responsibilities: Plan 8-hour virtual conferences (torture)
Force networking in breakout rooms
Create virtual happy hours (oxymoron)
Manage technical difficulties (constant)
Work every evening hosting virtual events
Ignore feedback that everyone hates this
Pretend virtual events are as good as in-person
benefits: Social skills atrophy**** (****forget how to interact IRL)

title: Newsletter Subscriber Guilt-Tripper
description: Write newsletters making free subscribers feel guilty for not paying. Perfect guilt-trip ratio: 70% guilt, 30% content.
qualifications: Master's degree in Emotional Manipulation
25+ years experience making people feel bad
Must be expert at passive-aggressive communication
Previous experience in Catholic education (understanding guilt)
Ability to monetize someone's FOMO
Own Substack with 10 paid subscribers
Expert at phrases like 'if you find value in this'
Can write 2,000 words explaining why you deserve money
responsibilities: Write newsletter guilt-tripping free subscribers
Create arbitrary paywall for mediocre content
Send emotional manipulation disguised as community building
Explain how $5/month will change your life
Work 40+ hours per week writing guilt trips
Respond to unsubscribes passive-aggressively
Convince people your thoughts are worth money

title: LinkedIn Engagement Pod Manager
description: Organize fake engagement for LinkedIn thought leaders. Create illusion of influence through coordinated liking and commenting.
qualifications: PhD in Fake Internet Points
30+ years experience gaming social media algorithms
Must have 50,000+ LinkedIn connections (quality irrelevant)
Ability to write generic supportive comments quickly
Previous experience in engagement pod schemes
Own 100+ fake LinkedIn accounts
Expert at appearing engaged while being disengaged
Can like posts without reading them efficiently
responsibilities: Coordinate engagement pods for fake influence
Write generic comments on posts you didn't read
Like posts within 60 seconds of posting
Manage multiple fake accounts for artificial engagement
Work 50+ hours per week creating illusion of relevance
Help mediocre content appear viral
Destroy authenticity of professional networking
benefits: Soul-crushing awareness you're part of problem
